overview: 'Kuttimaa' is a poignant tale between a rural naughty granny and her urban modern grandson Krish. Krish hates Kuttimaa since his childhood for her mischief and wit. But how a vacation unfolds his hidden love and affection makes the crux of the story.
tagline: The beautiful relationship between a grandmother & her grandchild.
title: Kuttimaa
